articles.title: The deeply personal reasons why many Indiana Senate Republicans said no to Trump - CNN
articles.description: Jean Leising spoke at a breakfast this fall at her 8th grade grandson’s school. Hours later, when she was set to give him a ride home from basketball practice, he bashfully told her that his entire team had received text messages about her that day — “and the…
